description:
A secure and free password manager for all of your devices.


- Security update for generating passphrases
- Enable email verification for account creation 📫
- Updated SDK reference licensing
- Small bug-fixes and enhancements 🐛
Dependency updatesThank you! 💙 A big shout-out to the following community members for their contributions!SamFrank234 - Fix filter icon alignment
jmlrt - Allow cli snap to access home and removable-media
